[Page Title: Charleston Waterfront Wedding Venues in Mount Pleasant Village]

Begin Your Happily Ever After at our Beautiful Charleston Wedding Venue

Blending southern charm with breathtaking waterfront views, Charleston Harbor Resort & Marina is the wedding destination of your dreams. Beyond weddings, many of life’s most precious moments are celebrated with us. Our surroundings and stellar service ensure beautiful and lasting memories of your special anniversary, birthday, graduation, or any event you'll hold dear forever.

Stylish Venues for Events of Distinction

Choose from 9 inspired venues, including our private beach  that capture the essence of the Lowcountry and the beauty of the downtown Charleston skyline. No matter which venue you choose, you can trust that our experienced, knowledgeable team will make the planning process effortless by assisting with everything from event space setup and design, to guidance in making the perfect menu selection. Our wedding and event venues offer everything needed for creating cherished memories and entertaining guests with luxury and style.
Link to Indoor Venues 
Our Indoor Venues

The Yacht Club & Bridge Bar

The Yacht Club features 2,100 square feet of beautiful space, made almost entirely of windows that offer views of the Charleston Harbor Marina and downtown skyline. The nautical feel of the space is ideal for any celebration, with reclaimed wood plank floors and drop ceilings with stained wood beams. The built-in sound system ensures a flawless presentation or night of dancing. Bridge Bar is an open- air space connected to the Yacht Club overlooking the USS Yorktown and historic Charleston skyline

Details & Capacities:

2,100 sq. ft. | U-Shape/Board – 65/70 | Theater – 175 |
Classroom – 100 | Rounds of 10 – 120 |
Crescent Rounds – 90 | Reception – 80

Sunrise Terrace & Deck

This 2,400 SQFT, climate-controlled space boasts a stunning view of the Charleston harbor, marina, and downtown skyline through picture windows. The Sunrise Terrace can be enjoyed as is with a simple, yet classic indoor setting or can be transformed to an indoor/outdoor dream with windows that open in full accordion style. Whether the windows are open or not, this space offers unobstructed 180° views for a wedding reception of up to 150 guests or up to 250 for a standing reception with heavy hors d’oeuvres.

Details & Capacities:

2,400 SQFT. | Theater – 250 | Rounds of 10 – 150 | Reception – 180

Charleston Harbor Fish House Porch

The Porch at our on-site restaurant offers 1,340 square feet of private dining space, complete with climate control and large screen doors that can be opened seasonally to let the fresh harbor breeze flow through. Existing seating can accommodate up to 72 people, or we can arrange the space in a reception-style layout for up to 100.

The Harbor Room at Charleston Harbor Fish House

The USS Yorktown and Ravenel Bridge are your backdrops when you choose the Harbor Room at Charleston Harbor Fish House. This semi-private dining space is located off the main dining room and can accommodate up to 44 guests.

Atlantic Ballroom

Our 1,700-square-foot ballroom opens onto the Harbor Terrace and looks out over the pool, beach, and harbor. It provides an intimate atmosphere for up to 80 guests for served lunches and dinners or 150 guests for standing receptions.

Details & Capacities:

1,700 sq. ft. | U-Shape/Board – 45/48 | Theater – 165 | Classroom – 88 | Rounds of 10 – 120 |
Crescent Rounds – 72 | Reception –150
Link to Outdoor Venues 
Our Outdoor Venues

Harborside Beach

Whether you’re planning a casual or elegant affair, Harborside Beach is the perfect setting. Enjoy breathtaking views of the Charleston Harbor and historic downtown skyline while celebrating a wedding ceremony or reception, themed party, concert, or other social soiree.

Details & Capacities:

21,600 sq. ft. | Theater – 650 | Rounds of 10 – 500 | Reception – 1,900

Lookout Pavilion

Our premier outdoor venue, the Lookout Pavilion and its adjacent lawn are perfect for wedding ceremonies, receptions, concerts, carnivals, teambuilding events and more. The Pavilion features a wood-burning fireplace and its own private restrooms, and can comfortably host up to 350 for a seated meal or 550 for a standing reception. If you book the covered area and lawn, events can grow to more than 1,000 guests.

Details & Capacities:

4,900 sq. ft. | Theater – 560 | Classroom – 280 | Rounds of 10 – 350 | Crescent Rounds – 210 | Reception – 1,000

Beach Club Events Lawn

Our newest ceremony space features a manicured lawn and garden and views of the marina, Cooper River, and USS Yorktown. It’s perfect for sunset weddings or photo shoots.

Details & Capacities:

1,685 sq. ft. | Theater – 165 | Rounds of 10 – 120 | Reception –150
Contact us to begin planning your wedding or special event at Charleston Harbor Resort & Marina. 
Choose Your Stay
Link for CTA-Item1 
The Beach Club
Check Availability Link for CTA-Item2 
Harborside
Check Availability

[Page Title: Fine Dining in Mount Pleasant Village | Resort Dining in Charleston, SC]

Enjoy Fabulous Cuisine & Cocktails at Our Charleston Resort

Whether you are staying at Charleston Harbor Resort & Marina or are just out for a relaxing dinner by the water, we have all your dining needs covered. Sip on a cocktail by the pool from our Tiki Bar. Enjoy a casual meal and some conversation with the locals at the Reel Bar. Or take in unparalleled views while trying some of the freshest seafood in town at the Charleston Harbor Fish House.
Link to Charleston Harbor Fish House 
Charleston Harbor Fish House
Fresh Seafood. Fresh Drinks. Fresh Air. 
Voted one of the “Top 25 Restaurants in Charleston” by , the Fish House is Charleston’s premier location for waterfront dining. The menu, which changes seasonally, offers a variety of options from both land and sea, with a focus on featuring the freshest catches of the day and locally sourced ingredients whenever possible. This on-resort restaurant is open daily for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
Charleston Living Magazine WEBSITE 
Hours of Operation:

Breakfast Buffet Hours:

7am- 10:30am

Lunch Hours:

11:30am - 3pm*

Dinner Hours:

4:30pm - 9pm Sunday - Thursday | 4:30pm - 10pm Friday & Saturday

Reservations Strongly Recommended for Dinner

*Limited menu from 3:00 PM to 4:30 PM

Please click  to view Fish House Menu.
HERE 
Bridge Bar

The Bridge Bar is the only rooftop bar overlooking the entire Charleston skyline, as well as the Ravenel Bridge and USS Yorktown. This view, combined with great cocktails and flavorful appetizers, makes our open-air bar the place to be. Stop in with family and friends for a memorable night in the friendliest city in the U.S.

Open 5pm-9pm Monday- Thursday

Open 4pm - 10pm Saturday-Sunday

*excluding days of event rental & weather permitting

please call 843-284-7019 to inquire

Reel Bar

Whether you’re hungry for a quick bite or thirsty for a refreshing cocktail, a visit to the Reel Bar is sure to please. Complete with an impressive display of antique tackle gear, the Reel Bar offers the ideal locale to relax and unwind while dipping your toes in the sand.

Hours of Operation:

| Monday - Thursday (Food available: 5pm - 10pm)
4pm - 10pm 
| Friday  (Food available: 5pm-10pm)
4pm - 12am 
|Saturday (Food available: 5pm-10pm)
12pm - 12am 
| Sunday (Food available: 12pm-10pm)
12pm - 10pm Live music is Thursday & Friday 6-9pm and Sundays 2-6pm at Reel bar

Private Dining & Events at Charleston Harbor Fish House

Charleston waterways are the perfect backdrop for any special event. Host a birthday, corporate event, anniversary, or other special occasion in our Mount Pleasant restaurant and treat your guests to a delicious meal, tasty cocktails, and stunning views. We have four distinct areas available for private parties of up to 150 guests.

Contact our Group Sales Coordinator at  or for more details.
(843) 284-7026 sales@charlestonharborresort.com *Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness,
especially if you have certain medical conditions.

parties of 6 or more. To expedite service, no separate checks for parties of 6 or more.

The Porch at our on-site restaurant offers 1,340 square feet of private dining space, complete with climate control and large screen doors that can be opened seasonally to let the fresh harbor breeze flow through. Existing seating can accommodate up to 72 people, or we can arrange the space in a reception-style layout for up to 100.

The Harbor Room at Charleston Harbor Fish House

The USS Yorktown and Ravenel Bridge are your backdrops when you choose the Harbor Room at Charleston Harbor Fish House. This semi-private dining space is located off the main dining room and can accommodate up to 44 guests.

Atlantic Ballroom

Our 1,700-square-foot ballroom opens onto the Harbor Terrace and looks out over the pool, beach, and harbor. It provides an intimate atmosphere for up to 80 guests for served lunches and dinners or 150 guests for standing receptions.

Details & Capacities:

Harborside Beach

Details & Capacities:

21,600 sq. ft. | Theater – 650 | Rounds of 10 – 500 | Reception – 1,900

Lookout Pavilion

Our premier outdoor venue, the Lookout Pavilion and its adjacent lawn are perfect for wedding ceremonies, receptions, concerts, carnivals, teambuilding events and more. If you book the covered area and lawn, events can grow to more than 1,000 guests.

Welcome to Charleston Harbor Resort & Marina in Charleston, SC
Welcome to Charleston Harbor Resort & Marina, an unparalleled waterfront destination nestled in the heart of Condé Nast Traveler’s #1 city in the U.S. Here, we invite you to indulge in coastal chic accommodations, embrace unparalleled amenities, and immerse yourself in a world of activities set against the breathtaking backdrop of our stunning waterfront location. Our award-winning resort is more than just a retreat; it's a haven where Southern hospitality meets coastal inspiration. Join us in experiencing the perfect blend of luxury, relaxation, and adventure, where every moment becomes a cherished memory. Explore the extraordinary at Charleston Harbor Resort & Marina. 
The Beach Club
Conde` Nast Reader's Choice ® 
The Beach Club provides an authentic Charleston experience complemented by gracious, personalized service, high-end accommodations, and a relaxed coastal setting. Not only are we Charleston's only LEED certified hotel, but the Condé Nast Readers' Choice Awards 2023, we were named #4 Resort in the South and named the #5 resort in South Carolina by Travel + Leisure for the fourth year in a row.
Learn More 
Harborside
A Waterfront Retreat 
The nautically inspired décor of Harborside blends perfectly with the lush, private beachfront that is perfect for enjoying captivating sunsets over the Charleston Harbor and soaking in the picturesque views of the Holy City. This seaside retreat is ideal for family vacations or relaxing weekend getaways.
Learn More 
Charleston, SC Resort Amenities

Amenities

Charleston Harbor Resort is a true one-stop destination resort, offering a 30,000-square-foot tropical pool deck, Charleston's only waterfront Tiki Bar, an educational and interactive children's program, and an array of water activities for the entire family directly from our marina docks.

Explore Our Charleston Resort

Estuary Spa

Explore

[Page Title: Fine Dining in Mount Pleasant Village | Resort Dining in Charleston, SC]

Enjoy Fabulous Cuisine & Cocktails at Our Charleston Resort

Whether you are staying at Charleston Harbor Resort & Marina or are just out for a relaxing dinner by the water, we have all your dining needs covered. Sip on a cocktail by the pool from our Tiki Bar. Enjoy a casual meal and some conversation with the locals at the Reel Bar. Or take in unparalleled views while trying some of the freshest seafood in town at the Charleston Harbor Fish House.
Link to Charleston Harbor Fish House 
Charleston Harbor Fish House
Fresh Seafood. Fresh Drinks. Fresh Air. 
Voted one of the “Top 25 Restaurants in Charleston” by , the Fish House is Charleston’s premier location for waterfront dining. The menu, which changes seasonally, offers a variety of options from both land and sea, with a focus on featuring the freshest catches of the day and locally sourced ingredients whenever possible. This on-resort restaurant is open daily for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

Bridge Bar

The Bridge Bar is the only rooftop bar overlooking the entire Charleston skyline, as well as the Ravenel Bridge and USS Yorktown. This view, combined with great cocktails and flavorful appetizers, makes our open-air bar the place to be. Stop in with family and friends for a memorable night in the friendliest city in the U.S.
